release_note: Adding a settings for default font size
Bug fixes
Adding canvas scaling option
Adding option of flipping shapes for line and poly lines
Custom Shape Library. You can save your shapes into your shape library.
Now you can export without opening a board. You can bulk export all boards in a folder Remember previous export settings
bug fixes
Adding a setting to prevent the screen to turn off while canvas is open
Bug fixes
Bug fixes
Bug fixes

New UI for the canvas screen Mouse support: mouse wheel scroll right click to open context menu Cmd left mouse drag to scroll etc Keyboard support: Various shortcut keys Pencil mode: draw with pencil and scroll with finger touch
Stability fixes Sign in with Apple Option to delete account
Removing the requirement of In App Purchase to export files Adding a tag to show integration details of Lekh Diagram with other softwares
Cloud and collaboration feature. Now you can store your drawings in the cloud and share them with other users. Also multiple remote users can draw and collaborate in real time.
Bug fixes
Support for infinite canvas Scribbling mode. Draw without shape recognition Erase mode. Erase shapes by dragging touch on screen
Bug fix for z index of shapes getting messed up in few cases
Adding UML in shape template
Minor bug fixes Added more details about the Lekh Board on the Lekh Board tab
Minor bug fixes
Bug fixes Shape recognition improvement

Multi stroke shape recognition. You can draw each side of a polygon or poly line separately. Draw a line and then draw another from the ending of the previous line now both lines will be joined. Increasing accuracy of the shape recognition. Recognizing connection of any kind. Now you can draw any connection and the Lekh Diagram will recognize the connection. You can even draw connection using multiple strokes of drawing. Adding a page to show the details of Lekh Board app

User interface re design. Support for multiple pages in a single diagram file. Page size support. Now you can set a fixed page size of a canvas for example A4 A3 Letter etc. Support different types of arrows at the end of a connection line. Support for setting margin lines on canvas. Support for drag and drop from shape library to canvas. Grid lines on any background. Change canvas orientation landscape and portrait for fixed page size.
Adding a setting option to not reduce resolution of inserted image
Container shapes in shape library. Adding a settings to use pencil for drawing in selection mode.
Fix for purchase dialog not showing text in dark mode

Ability to add text anywhere on connection line Ability to move text on connection line Ability to add text on curve connection Ability to move the connection end point anywhere on shape Import using Files app Export using iOS native export UI
Improved interaction with selected shapes on canvas. Now drag the corners to resize shapes and drag the rotation icon to rotate.
Fix for shape help option not showing in some cases Improvement in shape recognition

Shape template library for UI wireframing Ability to add font awesome icons into diagram Search in shape library Copy paste: long press on shape to get copy option Snap to alignment lines Fix dropbox integration
Fixing a bug of not drawing shape library properly in some cases.
Enhancing shape library with following icons aws azure gcp network infrastructure citrix signs and pictograph office server rack and web icons
Text alignment: you can set vertical or horizontal text alignment.
iOS 8 compatible Enabling grouping un grouping of shapes. After selecting multiple shapes the shape menu will provide grouping functionality. Minor improvement in stroke and color popovers
iOS 7 compatible Library of basic and flowchart shapes Snap to grid capability Auto grow canvas and improved canvas zooming experience New input mode scrolling. Scroll canvas with one finger pan
Fix for font and text problem in SVG export

Enabling resizing of shape independently in horizontal and vertical directions tap black dot on selection rectangle a dotted rectangle will appear then drag the dotted rectangle Integration with Box. Diagrams can be exported to Box and can be imported from Box Fix Dropbox export. If diagram file already exists then update the same file rather than creating a new file. Misc bug fixes
iPhone support Zooming drawing canvas bug fixes
Following bug fixes: Fix for layout issue when app starts in landscape mode in IOS6 Fix for performance issue on retina display iPads Few other minor bug fixes
